timeline.message:
Several adjustments around the RoutingStrategy implementations

- Adjust the UnresolvedRoutingKeyPolicy to be a RoutingStrategy
implementation, hence implementing getRoutingKey for ERROR, RANDOM_KEY
and STATIC_KEY
- Use the UnresolvedRoutingKeyPolicy / fallbackRoutingStrategy instead
of the switch case
- Introduce a builder paradigm starting from the
AbstractRoutingStrategy, using it for annotation and metadata
implementation
- Deprecate constructors in favor of builder paradigm
- Adjust default of UnresolvedRoutingKeyPolicy#ERROR to
UnresolvedRoutingKeyPolicy#RANDOM_KEY
- Adjust the javadoc when applicable
- Provide (missing) test cases

#routing-strategy-fine-tuning

Remove deprecated constructor usage

Remove deprecated constructor usage of the AnnotationRoutingStrategy

timeline.bodyText: Since this is an abstract class, I doubt whether using the builder pattern here simplifies things.
timeline.author: abuijze

replies.bodyText: Not necessarily simplify, no, but giving us the flexibility to change whatever without creating [5/10/N] new constructors. So from the same stance as to why the other infra components have a builder instead of a constructor. Let's chat offline whether we should go this route for components of this size.
